finally the tool guy

I need screwdriver size 5
Good to see you too man, having a good day?

Hi. I'm glad to see you. So glad, I want to make a story. The story... The story of what would happen if riot was taken over by champions.

{{champion:266}} : We should implement a feature where when a team is about to lose, a DARKIN SWOOPS IN AND MAKES A BLOODY MESS OUT OF THE ENEMY TEAM'S ENTRAILS AND EATS IT AND LOVES IT AND EATS **ITSELF** AND LOVES IT.
{{champion:103}} :That's not _sexy_ enough.
{{champion:84}},{{champion:98}}, and{{champion:85}}  : It needs balance.
{{champion:12}} : NEEDS MORE HORNS!
{{champion:32}} : Needs more friends. {{item:3070}}

{{champion:22}} :Is his aim true?
{{champion:268}} : Is he doing this in the name of **SHURIMA**?

{{champion:222}} :NOPE!

THE END
